intro: Cacalia monosis, commonly known as the singleflower cacalia, is a flowering plant native to the western United States. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. Cacalia monosis is often found in open grasslands and along mountain slopes, where it thrives in full sun.
